text: @Swamy39 @narendramodi @PMOIndia  Sir business orders are getting cancelled ... Debtors are not paying ... We cannot pay the creditors ... In the midst of economic slowdown we cannot take this slowdown due to coronavirus ... How will we pay EMI's for working capital loan we have taken?!
